content.webTitle: Foster's owner to launch citrus-flavoured lager

fields.headline: Foster's owner to launch citrus-flavoured lager
fields.bodyText: The new owner of Foster's lager in Europe wasted no time yesterday in unveiling plans for the brand's first major UK launch in more than 10 years. Foster's Twist, a citrus-flavoured lager, will go on sale following the World Cup and will be backed by a multi-million pound advertising campaign, brewer Scottish & Newcastle said. The move comes just days after S&N paid £309m to Melbourne-based Foster's for the trademark throughout Europe, the Russian Federation and Turkey. The last big launch of a Foster's product in the UK was Foster's Ice more than a decade ago.
